// PasswordField.js
import React,{useState}from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faEye,faEyeSlash}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PasswordField=_ref=>{let{password,setPassword,selectedLanguage}=_ref;const[showPassword,setShowPassword]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{position:'relative'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:selectedLanguage==='hi'?'पासवर्ड':selectedLanguage==='ta'?'கடவுச்சொல்':'Password'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:showPassword?'text':'password',value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:selectedLanguage==='hi'?'अपना पासवर्ड दर्ज करें':selectedLanguage==='ta'?'உங்கள் கடவுச்சொல்லை உள்ளிடவும்':'Enter your password',style:{paddingRight:'40px'}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>setShowPassword(!showPassword),style:{position:'absolute',right:'10px',top:'50%',transform:'translateY(-50%)',cursor:'pointer'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:showPassword?faEyeSlash:faEye})})]});};export default PasswordField;
